page.title: 08LEOMINSTER SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY
page.content: Every day I get up at 7-30 .a.m. and start getting ready for school which starts at 8-50. When I get to school I have a bit of play first. When we go in at 8-50 we then go to register which normally lasts about five minutes and then to assembly.Then we have an English lesson which ends at 10-40. Then it's time for play which ends at 11-00. Next comes maths which is followed by lunch time at 12-00. Then comes play, some people have certain activities such as singing and dancing which ends at 1-15. Next we have either History , Art or Science etc. We have play at 2-20. Then we have Singing Together followed by Reading Laboratory and at 3-30 we go home.
